title: Mr.Docs
description: Full-fidelity C++ documentation, straight from your code.

page.title: Mr.Docs
page.description: Mr.Docs is a full-fidelity C++ documentation generator that reads your code and comments to produce precise, publish-ready reference docs.

banner.description: Native C++ understanding. No workarounds required.
banner.header: Keep the code simple. Get clear documentation.
banner.subheader: Mr.Docs understands modern C++. You focus on design and maintainability.

features.title: Single Source of Truth
features.description: Mr.Docs turns the documentation comments that live next to your C++ declarations into authoritative reference pages. One source of truth—your code.

features.title: Built for C++
features.description: Mr.Docs models C++ accurately: overload sets, concepts and constraints, deduced return types, aliases, constants, SFINAE, inherited and hidden members, niebloids, and more.

features.title: Multiple output formats
features.description: Export to AsciiDoc, HTML, or XML - or extend it with your own generator plugins.

features.title: Customizable
features.description: Highly configurable: control output format and theme, tailor symbol selection, and tune generation to match your project’s standards.

panels.description: Accurate rendering of attributes and exception specifications (e.g. [[noreturn]], noexcept).
Documentation comments become structured reference pages—synopsis, description, parameters, and returns.
Use directives to capture semantics beyond the signature.
Understands concepts, constraints, and SFINAE—rendered as you wrote them.
